summary: Matches orcish weapons & shield with armor.
descriptionHtml:
I always was disappointed with mismatching of orcish weapons and armor, but I never tried to solve this problem until I wanted to play pure orc-warrior. All retextures I\'ve found was too much green or completely gray. So, I have make this work with myself.

Weapons was recolored to match armor. Leather on weapons & scabbards now is same or near color as leather on armor (no yellow tint). Shield was recolored too. Leather on shield back was recolored.

Armor wasn\'t changed, only weapons & shield.
All based on official HD texture pack (except sword scabbards).

Sorry for my English.

known issues:
- Mace is little much more gray than other weapons. But it isn\'t so noticeably.
author: EvilCroc
